# Part II: Asking the Right Questions {.unnumbered}

Before you can act wisely, you have to know what to ask. This section focuses on how entrepreneurs identify the most urgent unknowns, shape meaningful questions, and generate smart, informed hunches. We’ll also explore the value of exploration before jumping to solutions.

We’ll cover:

- How to find the questions that matter most
- Turning unknowns into testable ideas
- The role of abduction and intuition
- Why premature hypotheses can backfire
